description:
Vegeta goes up against the last member of the 6th Universe, the assassin Hit! With movements so fast nobody can even see him, Hit proves to be a true match for Vegeta. Will the prince of Saiyans finally fall?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai 6 Uchuu Saikyou no Senshi! Koroshiya Hit Kenzan!!
Der stärkste Kämpfer des 6. Universums! – Die Audienz beim Auftragskiller Hit!
The Ultimate Warrior of Universe 6! Assassin Hit Appears!!
第6宇宙最強の戦士! 殺し屋ヒット見参!!
